steps.name: The user is on login page
The user enter the "<username>" in username field and "<password>" in password field and clicks login button
Click on add to cart button of first item
The user fills personal information form with following information
The user should direct to the checkout overview page and should see following information
The user click on  finish button
The user should direct to confirmation page and should see the message "MESSAGE: THANK YOU FOR YOUR ORDER"
